code: import{useSearchParams}from"react-router-dom";import{useFetch}from"../hooks/useFetch";import{useTitle}from"../hooks/useTitle";import{Card}from"../components";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const Search=_ref=>{let{apiPath}=_ref;const[searchParams]=useSearchParams();const queryTerm=searchParams.get("q");const{data:movies}=useFetch(apiPath,queryTerm);useTitle(`Search result for ${queryTerm}`);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("main",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"py-7",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-3xl text-gray-700 dark:text-white",children:movies.length===0?`No result found for '${queryTerm}'`:`Result for '${queryTerm}'`})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"max-w-7xl mx-auto py-7",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex justify-start flex-wrap",children:movies.map(movie=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card,{movie:movie},movie.id))})})]});};
